quote: George's passion for helping others shines through in all his work. Whether he's on stage at Social Media World in front of thousands or on a HubSpot onboarding call with one person, his energy, care and desire to teach shine through. Whether you're hiring George to speak, consult or teach, you'll get a human who comes through with everything you're asking for and more. I definitely recommend George as a top notch marketer, video creator, HubSpot expert and all around good person to know.
